org.jpacman.framework.ui

Class PacmanInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpacman.framework.ui.PacmanInteraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IButtonEvents, IKeyboardEvents

    public class PacmanInteraction
extends Object
implements IKeyboardEvents
    Class mapping events triggered by the UI to actions in the underlying Pacman model.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, Jan 30, 2012
